name: Final Fantasy IX Demake
description:
Demake of a portion of Alexandria at the very beginning of Final Fantasy IX.          Made in RPGMaker2000

Controls:    

 ENTER-confirm   ARROW KEYS-move   X- opens menu & back button [in menu]    Z-accept [in menu]

Sprites, Faceset, and Music/SFX Sources:
